name: Death Deserves Holidays
description:
Summary 

Play as the death and defeat the monsters that are killing so much people (giving you a lot of job). Save humanity and take your deserved free days!

 Controls 

  • Arrow keys - Move around
  • Z - Shoot death orb
  • X - Deflector hoe (repels enemy projectiles)
  • R - Restart
 Credits 

Design, art and programming by: @irx99, @MauVGames

Music by: @VictorVaz96
